attributes.action: Make Thatcher pay for her own funeral
attributes.additional_details:
Margaret Thatcher made an estimated wealth of around £66 million in her lifetime and ruined the lives of millions during her time in office.
Now as the Tory government slash public spending hitting the most vunerable they tell us we can afford the £8 million it was cost of her funeral.
I propose the cost of this extravegant event should come from her personal funds.
